description:
- Changed the Clavinet to a Saw Wave Synth and named the Keyboardist for the album
- Transcribed the outro solo that the Keyboards play
- Fixed fixed a couple inaccurate drum measures behind the first solo
- Fixed the the intro lead to match the record
- Change the bass from picked to fingered (Timi Hansen doesn't use a pick)
title: Abigail

description:
- Added Palm mutes to the guitar tracks
- Made a myriad of changes to the riffs
- Added chord names
- Completely rewrote the Drum track
- Made fixes to the Bass to match the fixes to the guitars
- Cleaned up inaccuracies in the solos according to the record 
- Also corrected incorrect Clavinet parts
title: Abigail
